title: Starfire
description: One girl discovers the secrets of a new world, secrets that could spark a galactic war.Cassiopeia isn't thrilled with traveling on the first starship to settle on a new earth, but it's not like she has a choice. Her father is the architect of this grand civilization and staying behind is not an option.Once she arrives on Arcadia, it's not so bad since her family is treated like royalty and the lush planet does offer salvation to the human race.But when a terrorist attack strikes and her father is killed, a mysterious and gorgeous boy rescues her, and she's plunged into a reality she never knew existed. Cassie shares an undeniable connection with this boy she doesn't understand, and she uncovers secrets about herself and the new planet no one wanted to emerge.
author: Jenetta Penner
